summary: An ordinance relating to zoning, establishing Use, Area and Height Districts on Lot 151, Block 16, C. D. Hillman's Meadow Gardens Addition Division No. 2, annexed to the City of Seattle under Ordinance No. 79227 on January 1, 1951, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by adding thereto three new sections numbered 2-276, 17-223 and 10-19, respectively.
